name: Leopard Rectangle Box
description: The Leopard Rectangle Box showcases the signature whimsical details of KIFU PARIS. This piece includes intricate inlay work of shagreen, pen shell & bronze patina brass to create this stunning pattern. Available in other sizes and different finishes. Handmade in Philippines. It should be wiped clean with a soft dry cloth. Direct sunlight should be avoided to prevent color variants, showcasing the natural components.
